About Me

Hello, I'm JohnAnthony Eletto, lifeguard, drummer, and computer science student at Marist College in Poughkeepsie, NY. Here you can see a picture of my awesome family! I'm in the middle in the suit. Don't forget to download my resume and send me an email.

Work Experience

Town of Oyster Bay - Ocean Lifeguard

June 2015-Present

  • Set up rescue equipment for it to be ready in the event of an emergency.
  • Maintain continuous surveillance on the ocean.
  • Spot rip tides and prevent pedestrians from traveling into them.
  • Perform rescues in the event of drowning or swimming problems.
  • Perform first aid and CPR according to the demands of a situation.
